title: How are people born and raised to do something? - Quora

response.answer_text: How are people born and raised to do something? IF you look at the questions and see the answers you’ll find stories that may be hard to believe but is true of so many victims and survivors of abusive family and friends. Reading stories can make you question the lack of empathy for young children that either grow up either strong from their experience or just accept their lot in life and become part of the statistics of toxic environments or bad luck in having the worse kind of parents which become horrible juveniles and adults. Remember it is every culture in various countries that horrors are still prevalent around the world because of cultural differences and religion too as their excuse to be horrible human beings.

Most people are born the regular way but there are some exceptions. And I guess how we are raised can depend on where and in what particular culture we are born and grow up. But most of us will be expected to get some education and do something useful wherever we grow up.

In Sanskrit, the word of your life is dharma. And the dharma rule, each of us has unique talents that need to be explored in this life. When we show these abilities, we find jobs. According to this rule, we will certainly find those talents when we ask: " what can i contribute to?", not " What can I get?"
